p(x1, x2, x3) = -1146.4372177580572 + 0.18395460772186745x1 + 0.8385564577647335x2 + 75.45028048207061x3 - 1.483572711875502E-6x4 - 2.3765001108417427E-4x5 - 1.2403842319143972x6 + 1.700392172103338E-5x7 - 0.027248118399374112x8 - 0.00641282228494654x9
Dengan definisi:
x1 = x1
x2 = x2
x3 = x3
x4 = x1^2
x5 = x2^2
x6 = x3^2
x7 = x1*x2
x8 = x2*x3
x9 = x3*x1

p(50.0, 76.0, 29.3) = 0.9439070941991012
